properties.description: The trigger runs the pipeline PL_KHCDE_PROCUREMENT_FRONTOFFICE_SNOWFLAKE_EXTRACT on 4th of the following month of end of quarter to check and extract data from Snowflake views frontoffice_kst_purchase_order, frontoffice_srm_purchase_order, frontoffice_srm_invoices, frontoffice_kst_vendor, frontoffice_kst_account_payables, frontoffice_kst_invoices.
